and a.task_id = #{item.taskId}
and a.is_delete = 1

select a.id,b.model,b.no,c.nickname,a.end_time,a.flight_seconds from ljcx_task_records a left join ljcx_uav_info b on a.plan_id = b.id left join account_user_base c on c.id = a.perform_user where a.task_id = #{taskId}
select count(1) task_num,sum(flight_seconds) flight_sum_seconds from ljcx_task_records where plan_id = #{planId}

select count(id) flightCount,ifnull(sum(flight_length),0) flightLength ,ifnull(sum(flight_seconds),0) flightSumSeconds,ifnull(ROUND(avg(flight_seconds),0),0) flightAvgSeconds from ljcx_task_records where task_id= #{taskId}
